The Real Problem

Why Uzbekistan's Investment Market Struggles

Investment is the heart of economic growth. But in Uzbekistan, critical barriers prevent progress.

Less than 1%of people in Uzbekistan invest

People Don't Trust the Market

  • Ordinary people do not invest
  • Don't understand stocks or markets
  • Cannot evaluate companies easily
  • Never used analysis tools

Zero Transparency

  • Companies lack transparent financials
  • Almost zero analytics available
  • No indexes exist
  • No unified scoring system

No Tools Exist

  • No AI scoring systems
  • No predictive analytics
  • No education tools
  • Banks have no analytical tools for users

Global AI Doesn't Work

  • Global AI tools cannot be applied locally
  • Almost no structured datasets for UZ
  • Bloomberg, Yahoo don't cover UZ
  • No regional AI scoring exists

The Result: Lack of trust = Lack of investment = Lack of growth. SIGN addresses this problem.

Our Solution

SIGN Platform

An AI-powered investment intelligence platform designed to solve all layers of the problem: Users, Banks, Companies, Government, and the entire financial ecosystem.

First AI-Driven Indexes

National & sector-based smart indexes

Real-World Examples

How SIGN Helps People

Simple examples showing how different users benefit from SIGN.

Beginner Investor

asks:

"Is this company risky? Should I invest?"

SIGN provides:

  • Shows AI risk score (0-100)
  • Explains key risks in simple language
  • Compares with similar companies
  • Suggests safer alternatives if needed

Bank / Financial Institution

asks:

"We need to analyze SME credit risk quickly."

SIGN provides:

  • AI-powered risk scoring engine
  • Financial health index for each company
  • Automated credit assessment
  • Batch processing for portfolios

Government / Regulator

asks:

"How healthy is the textile sector right now?"

SIGN provides:

  • Sector heatmaps showing health trends
  • Index movement tracking over time
  • Early warning signals for problems
  • Data-driven policy insights
Key Features

What Makes SIGN Powerful

A comprehensive platform designed to transform Uzbekistan's investment landscape.

AI-Trained Analytics

We train on global index histories, price movements, volume patterns, economic cycles, trading behaviors, technical indicators, and investor sentiment.

SIGN Indexes

The first national indexes: SIGN-10 (Top 10), SIGN-20 (Mid-size), SIGN-50 (Full market), plus sector indexes for Agro, Textile, IT, Energy, and Logistics.

AI Company Scoring

Each company receives: Financial health score, Risk evaluation, Growth potential, Market sentiment, Valuation band, and AI-based Investment Readiness Index.

AI Investor Mode

Ask any question, get recommendations, learn how indicators work, view predicted scenarios, and understand risks instantly.

Education Layer

Built-in courses: Investing basics, Risk management, How indexes work, How to read company reports, AI-certified learning modules.

Partnership Ready

Ready for banks (Agrobank, Ipak Yuli, Hamkorbank), brokers (Jett.uz, Freedom, Avesta), government institutions, and business associations.

The Gap

Why Existing Tools Cannot Solve This

This problem requires a solution built specifically for Uzbekistan.

No Public Datasets

Uzbekistan lacks organized, accessible financial data for AI training.

Global AI Doesn't Support UZ

Bloomberg, Yahoo Finance, TradingView have zero coverage of Uzbek companies.

No Local AI Scoring

No existing platform offers AI-powered company scoring for Uzbekistan.

Banks Lack Smart Tools

Banks have no AI tools for retail investor guidance or SME credit scoring.

No National Investment Index

Unlike S&P500 or FTSE, Uzbekistan has no equivalent benchmark index.

SIGN is being built to fill this gap â€” the first AI-powered investment platform designed specifically for Uzbekistan's market.

30-100k UZS/mo
B2C â€” Freemium
  • Free: Basic analytics, indexes, education

Enterprise pricing
B2B â€” SaaS Licensing
  • Banks, brokers, funds pay for:
  • AI dashboards & Sector heatmaps
  • Algorithmic scoring & Risk engine

Revenue share

  • Redirect users to: Jett.uz, Freedom Broker, Avesta

  • % of account funded
  • Revenue share model

Transparency

Risks & Limitations

We believe in transparency. Here are the challenges we're aware of and how we address them.

Limited Public Financial Data

Challenge:

Uzbekistan's financial reporting is still developing. Some company data may be incomplete.

Our approach:

We use transfer learning to supplement gaps with global patterns.

Partnership Dependencies

Challenge:

Early-stage datasets require partnerships with brokers and exchanges for real-time data feeds.

Our approach:

We're actively pursuing broker partnerships and exchange API access.

Not Financial Advice

Challenge:

AI predictions and scores are analytical tools, not investment recommendations.

Our approach:

Clear disclaimers and educational content to set proper expectations.

Transfer Learning Limitations

Challenge:

Some models depend on global market patterns that may not perfectly translate to local context.

Our approach:

Continuous local data collection and model fine-tuning over time.

Regulatory Environment

Challenge:

Financial technology regulations in Uzbekistan are evolving.

Our approach:

We focus on analytics only â€” no trade execution, no custody of funds.

Impact for Uzbekistan

Economic Growth

Technology Stack

How SIGN Works (Simple Explanation)

  • 1SIGN uses 4 layers of AI models to analyze companies
  • 2We combine financial data, news sentiment, and machine learning
  • 3Transfer learning from global markets fills local data gaps
  • 4The system creates risk scores and investment indexes
